member.name: T:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions
member.summary:
Add localization support for dot net core web apps with one simple step.
download necessary resource files from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.AddExpressLocalization``1(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Action{LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions})
member.summary:
Add all below localization settings with one step;
define supported cultures adn default culture
Add global route template for culture parameter e.g.: http://localhost:1234/{culture}/xxx
Add route value request culture provider
Add view localization using shared resource
Add DataAnnotations localization
Add ModelBinding localization
Add IdentityError localization
Related resource files can be downloaded from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources
member.typeparam: Type of localization resource, this resource should contain all localization messages for Identity, ModelBinding, DataAnnotations localized validiation messages and view localizations as well.
member.param: ExpressLocalizationOptions such as supported cultures and default culture

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.AddExpressLocalization``2(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Action{LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions})
member.summary:
Add all below localization settings with one step;
define supported cultures adn default culture
Add global route template for culture parameter e.g.: http://localhost:1234/{culture}/xxx
Add route value request culture provider
Add view localization using shared resource
Add DataAnnotations localization
Add ModelBinding localization
Add IdentityError localization
Related resource files can be downloaded from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources
member.typeparam: Type of ExpressLocalizationResource, this resource should contain Identity, ModelBinding and DataAnnotations localized validiation messages.
Type of ViewLocalizationResource, this resource is a shared view localization resource.
member.param: ExpressLocalizationOptions such as supported cultures and default culture

member.name: T:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages
member.summary:
Call these fields directly from inside valdiation attibute tag, e.g.:
[Required(ErrorMessage = DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.RequiredAttribute_ValidationError)]
Original messages obtained from: https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.ComponentModel.Annotations/src/Resources/Strings.resx

member.summary: The argument '{0}' cannot be null, empty or contain only whitespace.
